name: Monocle
description: Monocle is a View Extension for Dynamo 2.0.x. Monocle contains a set of useful tools for package identification, graph cleanup and more! Monocle is authored by John Pierson (@60secondrevit) of Parallax Team (http://www.parallaxteam.com/) and designtechunraveled.com.  (Note: Dynamo may need to be closed and reopened to see the extension)
